chat_history.message:
Hello,

My Galaxy S21 5G has the above problem:
Battery is significantly bulging, causing the back cover to open on both sides. Battery performance decreases very quickly. Recently had problems with network reception outside of Wi-Fi.

Thank you for your help,

Dear Backcare,

Unfortunately, we are unable to repair the device and we do not have enough stock for replacement. Instead, we have refunded the customer.

Regards,
TB
